response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This unique offering is not just an item but a testament to excellence that could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, we believe it's worth considering a special introductory price of $8,500 for you. This opportunity is exclusive and tailored to recognize your discerning taste and potential for innovation. We look forward to discussing how this product can elevate your goals. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 8500}
